amendment.description: Amendment reduces funds for the Office of the Under Secretary for Management by $5 million and increases funds for the Staffing for Adequate Fire and Emergency Response Grant by $2.5 million and the Assistance to Firefighters Grants by $2.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for the Office of the Under Secretary for Management by $5 million and increase funds for Firefighter Assistance Grants by $5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Runyan amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
